name: Onitama (Nerdiful)
description:
Local multiplayer game.

Move your pieces according to the patterns on the cards. A card played is swapped with the neutral card in the middle. Players take turns each move.

The 4 smaller pieces are called monks and the single large piece is called the Sifu. All pieces move the same according to the card played. To win eliminate the opposing players Sifu or move your own Sifu into the opposing players temple (the square the Sifus spawn on).

To play first select the card you want to use. Then click and drag the piece you want to move. Available spaces are highlighted. Any time you move any of your pieces into an opposing players pieces space your opponents piece is removed.
